articles.title: S&P 500 Index (SPX) Sees Worst Week Since October Amid Geopolitical Tensions - Bloomberg
articles.description: Just weeks ago, it all felt so easy. Jerome Powell was poised to kick off the great monetary pivot in earnest thanks to the steady demise of inflation, while Corporate America’s famous profit machine vindicated the euphoria on Wall Street and beyond.

articles.title: US consumer sentiment falls more than expected as inflation fears rise - Fox Business
articles.description: U.S. consumer sentiment declined in April while Americans' inflation expectations increased as rising prices continue to take a toll on household budgets.
articles.content:
U.S. consumer sentiment and Americans' view on the economy both fell more than expected in April, as inflation expectations rose.

articles.title: The April 8 Total Solar Eclipse: Through the Eyes of NASA - Science@NASA
